titles.title: I Sing The Mighty Power Of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I sing the mighty power of God, newline That made the mountains rise; newline That spread the flowing seas abroad, newline And built the lofty skies, newline That spread the flowing seas abroad, newline And built the lofty skies.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I sing the goodness of the Lord, newline That filled the earth with food; newline He formed the creatures with His word, newline And then pronounced them good, newline He formed the creatures with His word, newline And then pronounced them good.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There's not a plant or flower below, newline But makes Thy glories known; newline And clouds arise, and tempests blow, newline By order from Thy throne; newline And clouds arise, and tempests blow, newline By order from Thy throne. newline Amen.
